name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】hololive 3rd Generation Live#きゅるるん大作戦〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜【DAY2】 [XJJXk28ivwY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening title card for "hololive 3rd Generation Live #KyururunDaisakusen 〜SaikyoIdol, OsuShikanaiDesho〜" Day 2. The screen features the 3rd generation members: Usada Pekora, Shiranui Flare, Shirogane Noel, and Houshou Marine.
"Attention" information slide for attendees, providing guidelines on lighting effects and cheering during the concert.
Promotional slides showcasing the second phase of merchandise (2次販売グッズ) for the live event, including support sets, apparel, and accessories.
Montage of numerous fan-submitted messages and illustrations expressing support and celebration for the hololive 3rd generation members.

subtitles.original: きゅるるん大作戦〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜
subtitles.english: Operation Kyururun 〜The Greatest Idols, You Have to Stan Them!〜

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon

subtitles.original: 演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
